column4: Question: trying to upgrade from 6.10 to 7.04.. tells me not enough diskspace, I need 159M on /usr. But my /usr is under / and I got 1.2 GIG available.. tried multiple times, common problem?
I'll try and delete some more junk then
thanks (should be obvious shouldn't it hehe now I feel silly :)
or try uprading from the alternate cd ,  it will save you having to cache the data to your hdd
